epic.basic

Class BasicSimulationState

  • java.lang.Object
    • epic.basic.BasicSimulationState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    broadwick.stochastic.SimulationState

    public class BasicSimulationState
extends Object
implements broadwick.stochastic.SimulationState
    BasicSimulationState contains a stateName (e.g. S, I or R) and an integer state value (e.g. number of infecteds). It provides methods to increment and decrement the state value.
    Version:
    9 April 2014
    Author:
    Samantha Lycett
